scripts.dev: parcel src/index.html public/images/virtAusstCursor.png public/images/virtAusstCursor_EN.png public/images/virtAusstCursor_prev.png public/images/virtAusstCursor_prev_EN.png public/images/virtAusstCursor_next.png public/images/virtAusstCursor_next_EN.png
scripts.build: parcel build src/index.html public/images/virtAusstCursor.png public/images/virtAusstCursor_EN.png public/images/virtAusstCursor_prev.png public/images/virtAusstCursor_prev_EN.png public/images/virtAusstCursor_next.png public/images/virtAusstCursor_next_EN.png
scripts.predeploy: rm -rf dist && parcel build src/index.html public/images/virtAusstCursor.png public/images/virtAusstCursor_EN.png public/images/virtAusstCursor_prev.png public/images/virtAusstCursor_prev_EN.png public/images/virtAusstCursor_next.png public/images/virtAusstCursor_next_EN.png --public-url https://www.brotherland.info && cp CNAME ./dist
